casebody.data:
In the Matter of the ESTATE OF Charles W. PICKELSIMER, Jr. Appealed By: The Ann B. Pickelsimer Family Trust, Lynn P. Williams, Charles W. Pickelsimer, III, and Whitney A. Butterworth n/k/a Whitney Rivera, Caveators-Appellants. No. 328P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 15, 2015. K. Edward Greene, Raleigh, for The Ann B. Pickelsimer Family Trust, et al. Tobias S. Hampson, Raleigh, for The Ann B. Pickelsimer Family Trust, et al. Chip Holmes, Attorney at Law, for Brevard College. Robert Wishart, Charlotte, for McCrary, Betty. Michael K. Pratt, Brevard, for Shelter Available for Family Emergency (SAFE), Inc. Robert B. Long, Jr., Asheville, for Albertson, David.

Philip S. Anderson, Asheville.

Phillip T. Jackson, Marion, for Transylvania Community Hospital. June K. Allison, Charlotte, for McCrary, Betty.

Jessica C. Dixon, Charlotte.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 22nd of September 2015 by Caveators in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2015."
